import datetime

from pydantic import BaseModel, validator



[docs]class UserSignUp(BaseModel):
    username: str
    password: str


[docs]    @validator('password')
    def validate_password(cls, value):
        if len(value) < 6:
            raise ValueError('Password must have a minimum length of 6 characters')
        return value



[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True
